column4: # run after an installation^J^Jif [ $1 -eq 1 ] ; then ^J        # Initial installation ^J        /usr/bin/systemctl preset crond.service >/dev/null 2>&1 || : ^Jfi

# run before a package is removed^J^Jif [ $1 -eq 0 ] ; then ^J        # Package removal, not upgrade ^J        /usr/bin/systemctl --no-reload disable crond.service > /dev/null 2>&1 || : ^J        /usr/bin/systemctl stop crond.service > /dev/null 2>&1 || : ^Jfi

# run after a package is removed^J^J/usr/bin/systemctl daemon-reload >/dev/null 2>&1 || : ^Jif [ $1 -ge 1 ] ; then ^J        # Package upgrade, not uninstall ^J        /usr/bin/systemctl try-restart crond.service >/dev/null 2>&1 || : ^Jfi

^Jif [ $1 -eq 0 ] ; then ^J        # Package removal, not upgrade ^J        /usr/bin/systemctl --no-reload disable firewalld.service > /dev/null 2>&1 || : ^J        /usr/bin/systemctl stop firewalld.service > /dev/null 2>&1 || : ^Jfi

^J/usr/bin/systemctl daemon-reload >/dev/null 2>&1 || : ^Jif [ $1 -ge 1 ] ; then ^J        # Package upgrade, not uninstall ^J        /usr/bin/systemctl try-restart firewalld.service >/dev/null 2>&1 || : ^Jfi
# Should fail, as it would mean a problem in the mime database^J/usr/bin/update-mime-database /usr/share/mime &> /dev/null
